title: MOOC Learning Engagement Strategies and Self-Regulated Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and experience with online learning
context.additional_context: For undergraduate students in medical/legal/technical professions, conducting project-based assessments in real-time online classes using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute weekly learning plans by applying self-regulated learning strategies on the MOOC platform.
Through collaborative problem-solving activities, learners maintain real-time interaction with peers and instructors at an 80%+ participation rate.
Learners achieve a 90%+ completion rate in project assignments utilizing gamification elements.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
